casebody.data:
In re ADAMS et al. ARMOUR PACKING CO. et al. v. ADAMS et al. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. December 10, 1901.) No. 1,075. Appeal from the District Court of the United States for the Southern District of Georgia. Marrion W. Harris and Washington Dessau, for appellants. John I. Hall and Olin J. Wimberioy, for appellees.

Before PARDEE, MCCORMICK, and SHELBY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The proper decision of this case depends upon the facts, and as the findings thereof by the trial judge, upon which he rendered the decree appealed from, are fully supported by the evidence in the case, the decree appealed from should be affirmed, and it is so ordered.
